compatibility.notes: The Info-ZIP license is permissive and allows for both static and dynamic linking without imposing restrictions on the licensing of the combined work, provided that the terms of the Info-ZIP license are followed.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and disclaimer in all redistributions.
Mark altered versions clearly and do not misrepresent them as original Info-ZIP software.
Do not use the names 'Info-ZIP' or similar variations without permission for altered versions.
license.name: Info-ZIP
obligations: Redistributions of source code must retain the copyright notice, definition, disclaimer, and list of conditions.
Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the copyright notice, definition, disclaimer, and list of conditions in documentation or materials provided.
Altered versions must be plainly marked as such and must not misrepresent themselves as original sources or Info-ZIP releases.
